thread.title: SolarWinds Stockholders Encouraged to Contact Securities Law Firm about Takeover
thread.title_full: SolarWinds Stockholders Encouraged to Contact Securities Law Firm about Takeover

title: SolarWinds Stockholders Encouraged to Contact Securities Law Firm about Takeover
text: SolarWinds Stockholders Encouraged to Contact Securities Law Firm about Takeover   Published on 2015-10-23 15:44:30 SolarWinds Stockholders Encouraged to Contact Securities Law Firm about Takeover -- NEW YORK  <-   NEW YORK   Securities lawyers at Dunnam & Dunnam are investigating the board of SolarWinds (NASDAQ: SWI ) in connection with a buyout for only $60.10 per share. Concerned SWI investors are encouraged to contact attorney Hamilton Lindley by clicking here . The potential shareholder lawsuit will seek to ensure SolarWinds shareholders receive the highest price reasonably available for their stock and that all relevant information is disclosed. Dunnam & Dunnam has significant experience representing shareholders in securities lawsuits nationwide. SWI stockholders – or anyone with knowledge about this situation – should contact lawyer Hamilton Lindley at hlindley@dunnamlaw.com with questions, toll free at (844) 702-2990 or visit http://www.dunnamlaw.com/SWI . Find these personal injury lawyers on social media on Google+ , LinkedIn , Facebook , and Twitter .
